title: From Occident to Orient.
author: Smith, William Alexander.
snippet: For a couple of hours our road lies along the Crawick Waters, passing on the way the old home of the shepherd poet, Hyslop, the author of "The Cameronian's Dream," and other poems.

title: From Occident to Orient.
author: Smith, William Alexander.
snippet: Passing on through the Home Walks of the Duke of Buccleugh we follow up the wild little stream of the Crawick Waters as it makes its way between perpendicular clififs of rock, covered with shrubbery and young trees, until
